resources.string: FadCam is part of the FadSec Lab suite. For more information, click on \'view source code\' below.

FadCam is an ad-free, open-source video recording app that prioritizes privacy by not tracking or collecting any data. It is available exclusively on GitHub and through the official links mentioned in the README.

FadCam has been featured in popular YouTube channels like HowToMen and Xtream Droid, as well as discussed in GrapheneOS and thirty one other notable spots.
Join community for help, sharing ideas, and future app updates

string-array.name: tips_widget
string-array.item: 1/11 | Long press preview to disable it.
2/11 | Long press date widget to select clock display.
3/11 | Storage widget updates recording space in real-time.
4/11 | Stats widget shows total videos and space used.
5/11 | Change video quality in settings (HD, SD, FHD).
6/11 | Low on space? Adjust video quality for more recording time.
7/11 | Add watermark to videos in settings.
8/11 | Embed precise location in watermark via settings.
9/11 | Record with front camera? Choose in settings.
10/11 | Your preferences are saved and applied seamlessly.
11/11 | Need help? Join our Discord via the About section.

resources.string:
\n Videos: %d
Used Space: %s \n
Select watermark option\n(Default: Timestamp with FadCam)
For a speedy save, pick \'No Watermark\'. Adding a watermark? It\'s worth the wait, just a little longer to process!
Include location data in watermark. \nRequires GPS enabled \n(Default: Disabled)
Enable phone\'s GPS for adding latitude and longitude data to the watermark.

string-array.item: Alert! This is a restricted area. Start recording to gain access.
You\'ve found the secret button! It does nothing lol
Hurry! The system is about to explode‚Ä¶ or maybe it just needs a recording to calm down.
Well, this is awkward now‚Ä¶
What color is your Bugatti?

string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: DISCLAIMER
Does FadCam collect any user data?
Are there any ads in FadCam?
Why does FadCam request location access?
Does FadCam connect to the internet?
Is any data stored on external servers?
What happens to my videos after recording?
Does FadCam share my data with third parties?
General
Why does watermarking take so long?
Why is there a \'temp\' video?
How can I change the video quality?
Can I disable the preview?
How do I embed my location in the watermark?
Are my preferences saved?
Can I schedule recordings?
How do I update the app?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: FadCam does not condone or support any unethical or illegal use of this software. Misuse, such as unauthorized surveillance or invasion of privacy, is strictly against our guidelines. The authors are not responsible for any misuse of the application.
No, FadCam does not collect any user data.
No, FadCam is completely ad-free.
For adding location info to your watermarks.
No, FadCam does not connect to the internet.
No, all data is stored on your device.
Your videos are saved locally on your device.
No, FadCam does not share or collect any data.
The watermark is embedded in each frame of the video. The longer the video, the more time it will take.
The \'temp\' video is your original recording. It\'s auto-deleted after watermarking. If watermarking fails, the \'temp\' file stays as a backup.
Change video quality in settings: HD, SD, or FHD.
Long-press the preview area to disable it.
Enable location in settings for location data in the watermark. It will embed the precise longitude and latitude.
Yes, preferences and all settings are saved and applied seamlessly.
This feature is coming soon.
Check the official GitHub repo for updates.

resources.string: Important: This app is currently under development. New features are being added regularly.

‚Ä¢ Added 3 new shortcuts: Start, Stop Recording, and Torch Toggle (long press app icon to access)
‚Ä¢ Thumbnails now show hours, minutes, and seconds
‚Ä¢ Torch works seamlessly during recording
‚Ä¢ Enhanced video management with sorting options
‚Ä¢ Refreshed flashlight shortcut icon
‚Ä¢ AMOLED black theme for better visuals
‚Ä¢ Improved renaming functionality and crash fixes

‚Ä¢ Auto-scheduled recordings 
‚Ä¢ Auto-uploading to Google Drive 
‚Ä¢ Custom app icons 
‚Ä¢ App lock for enhanced privacy 
‚Ä¢ In-app video editor for simple tasks like trimming 
‚Ä¢ And many more exciting features!
Video saved to FadCam folder in Downloads

You are already using the latest version.
A new version (%1$s) is available. To update, please visit the F-Droid store or our GitHub repository for more details.
Are you sure you want to delete all videos?
Enable debug log file generation \n(Default: Disabled)
When enabled, a debug log file will be created in the Downloads/FadCam folder. This can help diagnose app issues.

resources.string:
IMPORTANT NOTE:
This is an unprocessed temporary file. Video processing (like adding a watermark) may have failed or been interrupted.

Recommended Action:
1. Rename this file now (using the menu).
2. Save it to your Gallery (using the menu).

This secures your recording. After confirming it saved correctly in your gallery app, you can safely delete this temporary file from this Records list if you wish.

Continuing to record without saving may risk losing this file if the app cache is cleared unexpectedly.
Recording is already in progress or paused.
Select specific lens if available e.g. Wide Angle Lens\n(Default: Main Lens(0))

AMOLED Black

resources.string: Remote control for FadCam is coming soon.
Pair FadCam clients using a QR code for secure, local-network remote control: start/stop recording, preview, zoom, switch camera, and more‚Äîall with end-to-end encryption.
Enable or disable audio recording for videos.\n(Default: Enabled)
Invalid bitrate. Enter a value between 64000 and 384000.
Configure audio bitrate and sampling rate for best quality. Default: 192000 bps, 48000 Hz, Stereo.

‚Ä¢ Bitrate (bps) controls audio quality and file size. Higher values mean better quality but larger files. 192000 is a good default for most uses. ‚Ä¢ Sampling Rate (Hz) is how many times per second audio is captured. 48000 Hz is standard for video, 44100 Hz is common for audio.
Recommended: 192000 bps, 48000 Hz for most users.
Choose the orientation for your videos. Portrait is best for social media; Landscape is best for YouTube, presentations, etc.

Bitrate controls video quality and file size. Higher = better quality, but larger files. Too high or too low may cause recording errors or poor quality. The recommended range depends on your device and selected resolution. The default value above is based on your current settings.
Default bitrate for this resolution and framerate: %1$s Mbps
Warning: Bitrate is very low. Video quality may be poor.
Warning: Bitrate is very high. Recording may fail or overheat device.
Invalid bitrate. Please enter a value between %1$s and %2$s Mbps.

Bitrate is the amount of data used per second of video. Higher bitrate means better quality but larger files. Too high or too low can cause problems. Default values are based on professional camera standards.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s?
Are you sure you want to permanently delete %1$d selected item(s)? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete all items? This action cannot be undone.
Restore %1$d item(s) to the public Downloads/FadCam/ folder?
Error restoring items. Some files might not have been restored or gallery might not be updated. Check app permissions for storage.
Essential permissions are missing. Please grant them to proceed.
SAF permission missing. Please grant access to the chosen folder.
To save recordings to a custom location, FadCam needs permission to access the selected folder. Please grant access when prompted.
